footer.createdBy: Created by Flash Galatine (Balmung) for the FFXIV community
footer.disclaimer: FINAL FANTASY XIV © 2010-2025 SQUARE ENIX CO., LTD. All Rights Reserved.
footer.notAffiliated: XIV Dye Tools is a fan-made application and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Square Enix.

harmony.title: Color Harmony Explorer
harmony.subtitle: Discover harmonious color combinations using color theory. Select a base color to generate classic harmony types.

matcher.title: Color Matcher
matcher.subtitle: Upload an image or select a color to find the closest matching FFXIV dyes.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Checker
accessibility.subtitle: Check how dye combinations appear to players with different types of color vision.

comparison.title: Dye Comparison
comparison.subtitle: Compare dyes side-by-side to see color differences and find the perfect match.

mixer.title: Dye Mixer
mixer.subtitle: Create smooth color gradients between two dyes and discover intermediate options.

harmony.simpleDesc: Strict harmony with precise dye matching
harmony.expandedDesc: Additional similar dyes per harmony color
harmony.companionDyesDesc: Choose how many additional companion dyes to show
harmony.selectBaseColor: Select a base color to generate harmonies

matcher.dragDrop: Drag and drop an image here
matcher.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PNG, JPG, GIF, WebP
matcher.privacyNoteFull: Privacy: Images never leave your browser. All processing happens locally.
matcher.sampleSizeDesc: Larger sizes produce more accurate color matching but ignore fine details
matcher.clickToSample: Click on the image to sample a color. Drag to sample a region. Use zoom controls or Shift + scroll to adjust view.

accessibility.selectUpTo: Select up to {count} dyes to check accessibility
accessibility.selectDyesToSeeAnalysis: Select dyes to see accessibility analysis
accessibility.pairComparisonNote: Click pairs of dyes above to compare distinguishability between them.
accessibility.verySimular: Very similar - may be hard to distinguish
accessibility.somewhatSimilar: Similar - some users may have difficulty distinguishing
accessibility.redGreenWarning: Red-green colorblind users may see this as a different color
accessibility.tritanopiaWarning: May be hard to see for tritanopia (blue-yellow colorblindness)
accessibility.achromatopsiaWarning: May be hard to see for total colorblindness

comparison.selectToSeeAnalysis: Select 2 or more dyes to see analysis

mixer.interpolationStepsDesc: More steps provide a smoother transition but may result in more repeated dyes
mixer.colorSpaceDesc: HSV typically produces more natural-looking transitions. RGB is linear but more mathematically straightforward.
mixer.noSavedGradients: No saved gradients yet. Click "Save Gradient" to create one!
mixer.selectTwoToSave: Please select 2 dyes to save gradient

filters.title: Dye Filters
filters.excludeMetallicDesc: Hide dyes with "Metallic" in the name
filters.excludePastelDesc: Hide dyes with "Pastel" in the name
filters.excludeCosmicDesc: Hide dyes from Cosmic Exploration & Cosmic Fortunes

marketBoard.title: Market Board
marketBoard.clearingCache: Clearing cache and fetching new prices...
marketBoard.refreshError: Error refreshing prices. Please try again.

errors.invalidRgb: RGB values must be between 0 and 255.
errors.databaseLoadFailed: Failed to load dye database. Please refresh the page.
errors.apiFailed: Failed to fetch data from market board.
errors.networkError: Network connection error. Please check your internet connection.
errors.imageLoadFailed: Failed to load image. Please ensure it is a valid image file.
errors.imageTooLarge: Image file is too large. Maximum size is 10MB.
errors.storageFailed: Failed to save settings. Storage may be full.
